statements: SELECT * FROM segregation_of_duties;
SELECT username, role FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS count FROM segregation_of_duties GROUP BY department HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS count FROM segregation_of_duties GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM segregation_of_duties ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role, department FROM segregation_of_duties WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE accessed_table = 'employees' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_name, accessed_table, action FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id WHERE action = 'read';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(access_time) AS latest_access FROM access_logs GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM SegregationOfDuties;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM SegregationOfDuties;
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM SegregationOfDuties WHERE role = 'Admin';

SELECT username, permission_name FROM SegregationOfDuties JOIN UserPermissions ON SegregationOfDuties.user_id = UserPermissions.user_id JOIN Permissions ON UserPermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM SegregationOfDuties
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM SegregationOfDuties INNER JOIN Permissions ON SegregationOfDuties.user_id = Permissions.permission_id

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM SegregationOfDuties INNER JOIN UserPermissions ON SegregationOfDuties.user_id = UserPermissions.user_id INNER JOIN Permissions ON UserPermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM users;
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='Admin';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM Roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT role_name, description FROM Roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT role_name, description FROM Roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT R.role_name, E.name FROM Roles R JOIN RoleAssignments RA ON R.role_id = RA.role_id JOIN Employees E ON RA.employee_id = E.employee_id;
SELECT A.activity_id, E.name, A.description, A.date_timestamp FROM FraudulentActivities A JOIN Employees E ON A.employee_id = E.employee_id ORDER BY A.date_timestamp DESC;
